faqs.question: What is the best health insurance plan in Patna?
faqs.answer: The best plan depends on your age, family size, and health needs. Citizen IMF offers individual, family, and senior citizen plans with coverage from ₹3 to 25+ lakhs. We help compare plans to find the best fit.

faqs.question: What is mediclaim insurance?
faqs.answer: Mediclaim is health insurance that covers hospitalization expenses. With cashless mediclaim, insurers pay hospitals directly without requiring upfront payment from the policyholder.

faqs.question: How much does health insurance cost in Patna?
faqs.answer: Health insurance premiums in Patna start from ₹500-1000 per year for basic individual plans and go up to ₹50,000+ per year for premium family plans, depending on coverage amount and age.

faqs.question: Is family insurance cheaper than individual policies?
faqs.answer: Yes, family floater policies are 30-40% cheaper than buying individual policies. One family policy covers all members (typically up to 5) at significantly lower cost.

faqs.question: What are the tax benefits of health insurance in India?
faqs.answer: Under Section 80D, health insurance premiums are tax-deductible up to ₹25,000 per year for individual/family and ₹50,000 for senior parents, helping reduce tax liability.

faqs.question: How to claim health insurance in Patna?
faqs.answer: Inform your insurer during hospitalization, provide medical bills and documents, and submit claims. Most insurers process claims within 30-45 days. Citizen IMF assists with the entire process.
